snippet: Marc Trestman compiled a 64-34 record and consecutive Grey Cup championships in five seasons with the Montreal Alouettes of the C.F.L.
abstract: Chicago Bears hire Marc Trestman as head coach; Trestman, who has not coached in the NFL for eight years, compiled a 64-34 record and consecutive Grey Cup championships in five seasons with Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League.
lead_paragraph: Marc Trestman compiled a 64-34 record and consecutive Grey Cup championships in five seasons with the Montreal Alouettes of the C.F.L.

headline.seo: Bears Hire Marc Trestman of the C.F.L. as Their New Coach
headline.main: Trestman Back in N.F.L. as Bears’ Coach After Successful Stay in C.F.L.
headline.print_headline: Trestman Back in N.F.L. as Bears’ Coach After Successful Stay in C.F.L.
